articles.title: "Things Could Go Crazy": Joe Biden Asks Americans To Leave Ukraine Soon - NDTV
articles.description: US President Joe Biden on Thursday urged American citizens to leave Ukraine immediately, and warned about potential major conflict with Moscow should US and Russian troops engage each other on the ground.
articles.content:
"American citizens should leave now," Joe Biden said in an interview.
